name: ditherer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who finds it difficult to make decisions: He's gaining a reputation here as a bit of ditherer, someone who can't really make decisions. He needs to persuade electoral ditherers to vote for him. See
dither
More examplesFewer examplesHis desire to please everyone has often rendered him a ditherer.There are two types of people: doers and ditherers.It's annoying when you get stuck behind a cash machine ditherer.
